Reviews.Title: Good but not as expected
Reviews.Author: bo_qbqb
Reviews.Content: Why this ratingIt does the jobLikeIt works very well in non-HD mode. Very good night visionDislikeVery slow with latency if work on wireless, though I have a high speed connection. Very slow with latency if work on HD modeIssuesDHCP didn't work. I had to change router's IP address range to access the camera, change the camera IP, then return back my router configuration.The built-in MIC is not working which makes the two-way audio monitoring unsuccessfulCommentsI haven't tried the other features like motion detectionRecommendationGo for other product or a sheaper one with the same features
